original_text: There she lusted after her lovers, whose genitals were like those of donkeys and whose emission was like that of horses.
korean_text: 그의 하체는 나귀 같고 그의 정수는 말 같은 음란한 간부를 사랑하였도다

sentences.original_text: There she lusted after her lovers
whose genitals were like those of donkeys
and whose emission was like that of horses
